concept.title: TokenScript Syntax
concept.shortdesc: The most important declarative terms used in the TokenScript XML file

conbody.p: The root element of a TokenScript File can be one of the following:

note.p: If a Token Issuer issues multiple tokens, it's important to define them in a single TokenScript file using , for TokenScript release management reason.
